meanings.definition: The quality of being clever and humorous in speech or writing.
meanings.sent1: Her wittiness always made everyone laugh during class.
meanings.sent2: His wittiness shone through in his stand-up comedy routine.
meanings.sent3: The wittiness of the joke caught everyone off guard and made them chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her wittiness was a shining beacon in the dull sea of conversation.
meanings.sent5: The wittiness of his storytelling painted vivid pictures in the listeners' minds.
